abstract: The police arrested 175 people across six provinces for theft and trafficking of $80 million worth of objects in what the government called the biggest antiquities trafficking case in the history of the People’s Republic.

headline.main: Chinese Tomb Robbers Used Feng Shui to Steal Antiquities

snippet: The police arrested 175 people across six provinces for theft and trafficking of $80 million worth of objects in what the government called the biggest antiquities trafficking case in the history of the People’s Republic.

keywords.value: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China
